title: [GAMEPLAY] Corki E causing weird pink bubble particles
body:
So I played Corki a couple of times just last night in a normal game and I noticed that whenever I cast my E (Gatling Gun) there would be strange pink bubble particles that came with it. It would start and end with the E animation so I assume its just a minor visual bug. I tried on varying effect quality levels and it was not affected.

REPRODUCTION
1. Load into a custom game
2. Pick Corki
3. Get E
4. Cast E and observe strange pink bubbles

It has occurred every time I played the champion.

replies.body:
It's happened every time I played Corki. I guess I'll try to repair the client then.

EDIT: Repairing the client didn't work, the pink bubbles persist ._.

D: 

Okie, I'll see what's happening on our end!
Just played another Corki game, looks like some people can see it but others can't. It's really weird.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=AMbIjLo5,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-29T16:23:55.732+0000)
>
> D: 
> 
> Okie, I'll see what's happening on our end!

It happened once for me too, it only works when im moving in and out of the base though, for me anyways
